altername_name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing: Uchikome Warai no Megaton Punch!!
name: Ready 2 Rumble Boxing
overview: Ding ding! Seconds out - the biggest fighters of the season take to the ring for some fast-punching action. With in-game announcements by Michael Buffery, hear the crowd roar as you box your way to victory. 16 boxers playable in Arcade or Championship modes, with an additional training mode. How many rounds can you go? If you think you could have been a contender - be one!
